Class GroovyScriptEngine

public class GroovyScriptEngine extends Object implements ScriptEngine
Groovy scripting engine.

    • isComplete

      public boolean isComplete(String cmd)
      Description copied from interface: ScriptEngine
      Checks if a string is a complete command. This can be used by a shell to determine if a multiline command is being composed by the user.
      Specified by:
      isComplete in interface ScriptEngine
      Parameters:
      cmd - command to check.
      Returns:
      true if complete, false if incomplete.

    • offer

      public boolean offer(String s)
      Description copied from interface: ScriptEngine
      Offers a string input to a running script. This is used to allow interactive scripts.
      Specified by:
      offer in interface ScriptEngine
      Parameters:
      s - string input
      Returns:
      true if consumed, false otherwise

    • input

      public String input() throws InterruptedException
      Description copied from interface: ScriptEngine
      Gets an input offered by ScriptEngine.offer(String). Blocks until an input is available or an interrupt. This is used to allow interactive scripts.
      Specified by:
      input in interface ScriptEngine
      Returns:
      input string, or null if input not supported
      Throws:
      InterruptedException
